Affiliate Disclaimer

kaidez.com is wholly owned by Kai Gittens, who has entered agreements with third parties to link to their goods and services.

The hope of both Kai Gittens and these third parties is that you will purchase their goods and services via these links. For every third party good and/or service you purchase via these links, Gittens will receive a commission.

As of September 8, 2013, these third parties include:
  • lynda.com
  • amazon.com
  • MaxCDN
  • Media Temple

kaidez.com also allows third-party ads to be displayed via Google Adsense. Gittens does not receive commissions if you purchase goods and services via the links in these ads, but may receive a commission if you go through a certain click stream that starts with clicking on these links.

The best way to think about it is this: if you click on a link from this site to a third party, you should assume that you are beginning a process that will earn Kai Gittens money.
